rules_text:
Prowess
[i]Dark Origins[/i] – You may cast noncreature historic cards in your graveyard. If a spell would be put into your graveyard this way, exile it instead. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
[i]Lieutenant[/i] – As long as you control your commander, other creatures you control have prowess.
